about-p1: I'm Matt Boatman, a software engineer living in Columbus, Ohio. I work as a Senior Consultant for Improving.
about-p2: I'm happily married to my wonderful wife, Julie, who is a resident physician at Mount Carmel West hospital. We are proud dog parents to the cutest dog in the whole world, Belle.
about-p3: In my free time I love to cook, garden, drink coffee in the morning and beer at night, play video or board games, and eating good food.
contact-interested: If you are interested in collaborating or would like to connect, please reach out!
date: The current date is {{date, MMMM Do}}
